orig_text: focused on the IETF executive structure
correct_text: focused on the IETF administrative structure
notes: Changing to describe as administratively-focused, consistent with the organizational descriptions in IASA1 and IASA2.

correct_text: including the Managing Director, IETF Secretariat,
notes: The definition of what the IETF Executive Director is has changed under IASA2. This correction reflects the new job definition and title.
